articles.content:
Greetings to prime minister of Denmark
    Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- Hong Song Nam, premier of the DPRK cabinet, sent a message of greetings to Anders Fogh Rasmusen upon his appointment as prime minister of Denmark.
 Hoping that the relations between the two countries would grow stronger on the principles of respect for sovereignty, non-interference in others' internal affairs, equality and mutual benefit, he wished the prime minister success in his responsible work.    
 Meanwhile, foreign minister Paek Nam Sun sent a similar message to his counterpart per Stig Moeller.
